How can I increase my workout performance can u give advice
To increase your workout performance, focus on maintaining a steady tempo. Implement the 3-1-3 count during exercises to keep each rep duration consistent and improve form quality.
Tempo is inconsistent. Use a steady 3-1-3 count for all reps.
To improve form quality, focus on maintaining a steady tempo. Use a 3-1-3 count for each repetition to ensure consistency and reduce the likelihood of inconsistent tempo contributing to lower scores.

Your workout is done! Well done!

Next, let's work on form quality. I noticed your tempo was inconsistent. To fix this, use a steady 3-1-3 count to keep each rep duration consistent.
What do u think about workout 1 issue how could I do better
Tempo was inconsistent, which affected form quality. To improve, use a steady 3-1-3 count for each rep to maintain consistency and follow the recommendation provided in the analysis.
What do u think about workout 1 issue how could I do better
"Tempo inconsistency can slow you down and decrease form quality. To improve, focus on using a steady 3-1-3 count to maintain consistent rep duration."
